thread.title: 'Singh Is Bliing' garners 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' like response at the box office
thread.title_full: 'Singh Is Bliing' garners 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' like response at the box office - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Singh Is Bliing' garners 'Bajrangi Bhaijaan' like response at the box office
text:
Akshay Kumar's romantic comedy Singh Is Bliing opened to a rocking start at the box office.
The film registered wonderful response in Punjab and Delhi circuit much in line with Akshay Kumar's previous hits Welcome and Singh Is Kinng. The film is expected to work well as Friday happens to be a Gandhi Jayanti followed by a two-day weekend. The response witnessed by the film is much like that received by Salman Khan's Bajrangi Bhaijaan which smashed all records at the ticket counters.
Singh Is Bliing is doing exceptionally well in East Punjab and Delhi/NCR areas.
(Source: Boxofficeindia.com)
